body_html:
Hi, @rtjarvis.
Looks like you are using some deprecated function in your code:
BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is not available in GraphDef version 21. It has been removed in version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().
Also I would suggest to use Bazel to build first. Looks like building with Android studio is still a bit experimental and need some fine tuning.
body_text:

BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is not available in GraphDef version 21. It has been removed in version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().
Also I would suggest to use Bazel to build first. Looks like building with Android studio is still a bit experimental and need some fine tuning.
body:
Hi, @rtjarvis. 
Looks like you are using some deprecated function in your code:
`BatchNormWithGlobalNormalization is not available in GraphDef version 21. It has been removed in version 9. Use tf.nn.batch_normalization().`
Also I would suggest to use Bazel to build first. Looks like building with Android studio is still a bit experimental and need some fine tuning.
